title: What earphones are compatible with MediaPad 10 FHD?
answer:
MediaPad 10 FHD incorporates a 3.5-mm headset jack, which is compatible with TRRS earphones with left or right audio outputs and a microphone audio input. Most non-OMTP earphones, such as iPhone 4 and Motorola Xoom earphones, are compatible with MediaPad 10 FHD.

 It is recommended that you use a Huawei earphone (optional and available separately) to ensure high audio quality.
